message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a content-based cross-domain recommendation method using a neural network for domain adaptation and item representation. This involves extreme multi-class classification and a denoising autoencoder. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with information retrieval (IR) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques for recommendation systems. Additionally, it involves natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) techniques for item representation. Hence, the other likely sub-categories are cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CL, and cs.CV.
